body_html:
It might be possible the Google webserver dropped support for older SSL clients, or the system JVM favors weak algorithms. In that case we might want to change the bazel downloader to try different URLs, rather than aborting.
…

body:
It might be possible the Google webserver dropped support for older SSL
clients, or the system JVM favors weak algorithms. In that case we might
want to change the bazel downloader to try different URLs, rather than
aborting.

On Thu, May 10, 2018, 6:44 AM Wei Wang <notifications@github.com> wrote:

> @poldap <https://github.com/poldap> Exactly the same issues and none
> workaround could solve it for me. :(
>
